short_description: beeguard is a honey farm based in labège, france.
long_description: discover our products to promote precision beekeeping. discover connected hive solutions that the beeguard team researches and develops daily for our primary lines of products. behind the connected hive technologies we deploy, one simple ambition motivates everything we do: to be useful. for every need, there's a solution. beekeepers work with bees in different ways, and beeguard connected hive solutions fit those needs—whether it's producing honey, performing environmental characterization, or assessing pollination service. bee biomonitoring is the answer to this need to measure the pollination service. from €1100 excl. tax/year. our solutions to connect your hives are modular and scalable. thanks to our bees and beeguard connected hives, measuring the benefit of our agroecological actions represents a first return on investment of this approach. as opposed to greenwashing, we prove what we're doing right, and we make meaningful, tangible progress. our operation must constantly evolve and develop practices to reduce the environmental impact of our vineyards.
generated_description: beeguard is a company based in labège, occitania, specializing in the development and supply of connected beehives. the company leverages new technologies such as the internet of things (iot) and artificial intelligence (ai) to provide beekeepers with tools that enhance their ability to monitor and manage their hives. beeguard's solutions include gps anti-theft tracking, weather stations, and integrated scales, which help beekeepers make informed decisions about bee health and activity. the company's products are designed to support precision beekeeping and biodiversity conservation, enabling farmers and land managers to measure and improve the impact of their actions on pollinators and the environment. beeguard is recognized as a leader in europe for its innovative approach to beekeeping technology.
generated_business_tags: weather stations | anti-theft gps | hive technology | pollination services | environmental characterizations | environmental biomonitoring | biodiversity assessments
